    • About Abel Tejeda


    ‘Our “About Us” web page would be more appropriately called “About You”, as our focus is on closing your loans faster and more efficiently. Our winning strategy consists of a carefully crafted blend of excellent Interest Rates, Flexible Loan Products and Exceptional Customer Service . This concept combines the winning combination: paperless loan process with instant automated loan approvals.’
